mapper.insert: Insert into ticket (cost, event_id, attendee_id, buyer_id) values (#{ticket.cost}, #{ticket.event.getId()}, #{ticket.attendee.getId()}, #{ticket.buyer.getId()})
mapper.sql: Select t.id as ticket_id, t.cost as ticket_cost, ev.id as event_id, ev.name as event_name, ev.theme as event_theme, ev.base_ticket_price as event_base_ticket_price, ev.start_date as event_start_date, ev.end_date as event_end_date, ev.address as event_address, ev.description as event_description, e.id as employee_id, e.first_name as employee_first_name, e.last_name as employee_last_name, e.address as employee_address, e.phone as employee_phone, e.email as employee_email, e.salary as employee_salary, a.id as attendee_visitor_id, a.first_name as attendee_visitor_first_name, a.last_name as attendee_visitor_last_name, a.address as attendee_visitor_address, a.phone as attendee_visitor_phone, a.email as attendee_visitor_email, b.id as buyer_visitor_id, b.first_name as buyer_visitor_first_name, b.last_name as buyer_visitor_last_name, b.address as buyer_visitor_address, b.phone as buyer_visitor_phone, b.email as buyer_visitor_email, p.id as presentation_id, p.name as presentation_name, p.description as presentation_description, p.start_datetime as presentation_start_datetime, p.end_datetime as presentation_end_datetime, p.ticket_price as presentation_ticket_price, pr.id as presenter_id, pr.cuil as presenter_cuil, pr.first_name as presenter_first_name, pr.last_name as presenter_last_name, pr.address as presenter_address, pr.phone as presenter_phone, pr.email as presenter_email, pr.specialization as presenter_specialization, r.id as room_id, r.name as room_name, r.surface as room_surface, r.capacity as room_capacity, r.status as room_status from ticket t left join event ev on t.event_id = ev.id left join event_employee ee on ee.event_id = ev.id left join employee e on ee.employee_id = e.id left join visitor a on t.attendee_id = a.id left join visitor b on t.buyer_id = b.id left join presentation_ticket pt on pt.ticket_id = t.id left join presentation p on pt.presentation_id = p.id left join presenter pr on p.presenter_id = pr.id left join room r on p.room_id = r.id
mapper.delete: Delete from presentation_ticket where ticket_id = #{ticketId} and presentation_id = #{presentationId}
